imdb.plot outline: Temple Mount takes a deep dive into the early events of Christianity: the mysteries, evidence, and controversies that define the founding moments of this world religion. Archeologists, art historians, and journalists investigate the stories and myths that have survived down the centuries to shape modern views and experiences of Christianity.
imdb.title: The Temple Mount
plot: Temple Mount takes a deep dive into the early events of Christianity: the mysteries, evidence, and controversies that define the founding moments of this world religion. Archeologists, art historians, and journalists investigate the stories and myths that have survived down the centuries to shape modern views and experiences of Christianity.
